data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Extrême-Nord, Cameroon.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Extrême-Nord, Cameroon
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: the state of Extrême-Nord has (about) 170,686 people who know Jesus, 801,319 people who know about him culturally, and 883,695 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Extrême-Nord.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Extrême-Nord, Cameroon will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Lord, please remember the Kotoko, Afade people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, may the churches in Extrême-Nord, Cameroon honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 170,686 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Extrême-Nord.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Extrême-Nord, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Extrême-Nord
location.people_groups_list: Giziga, South, Mandara, Kanuri, Yerwa, Fulbe-Gey, Fulbe, Fulani
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Giziga, South (136,000), Mandara (69,000), Kanuri, Yerwa (167,000), Fulbe-Gey (4,100), Fulbe, Fulani (2,564,000)
